details.title: Stereo-synthetic aperture radar technique with bias correction to estimate terrain height

authors.affiliation: Department of Electrical Engineering, The Graduate Institute of Communication Engineering, National Taiwan University, Taipei, Taiwan
authors.name: Kung-Yu Lu

authors.affiliation: Department of Electrical Engineering, The Graduate Institute of Communication Engineering, National Taiwan University, Taipei, Taiwan
authors.name: Jean-Fu Kiang

details.abstract: A stereo-synthetic aperture radar technique is proposed to estimate the terrain height of a target area. A systematic bias is observed to be in proportional to the height difference between the target area and the reference area. The estimated height error can be reduced to 1 m or less by correcting such bias.
